Class: conditionallyEnable

conditionallyEnable()

new conditionallyEnable()

A jQuery plugin to conditionally enable and disable fields based on the source's value. Supports field value restoration.
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Default Description
options.sourceValues string | function <optional>
 "y" a comma separated list of values that must match to trigger enabling fields, or a function that returns a true/false value for if the actual value is considered a match
options.enable string | function | object <optional>
 null jQuery selector of fields to enable when source value is equal to one of the sourceValues
options.disable string | function | object <optional>
 null jQuery selector of fields to disable when source value is NOT equal the sourceValues
options.additionalDisabledClasses string <optional>
 visible-md-block visible-lg-block additional classes to append to each field in fields when it is disabled
